entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 11:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: S 26 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
